Week.Name: ishant
Week.Meening: Tumble means 'fall and roll over and over.'

Week.Name: ishant
Week.Meening: Compassinate means 'kind to a person or animal who is suffering or unhappy.'

Week.Name: ishant
Week.Meening: Content means 'happy with what is happening or what you are doing.'

Week.Name: ishant
Week.Meening: Fearless means 'brave or feeling no fear.'

Week.Name: ishant
Week.Meening: Familiar means 'well known to you and easy to recognize.'

Week.Name: ishant
Week.Meening: Convince means 'make someone beleve something or decide to do something.'

Week.Name: ishant
Week.Meening: Hurl means 'throw something hard and fast.'

Week.Name: ishant
Week.Meening: Pester means 'keep bothering or annoying someone.'

Week.Name: ishant
Week.Meening: Glare means 'look at someone or something in an angry way.'

Week.Name: ishant
Week.Meening: Overalls are 'pants with sholder straps and a top part that covers the chest.' Overalls can be worn over other clothing.
